Html:
Hi all,

I have a problem with the "OnMarker" events . They are not triggered, and I do not know why ?

For informations, Markers has the IsHitTestVisible = true; And they are well displayed !

In fact I do not know what (properties like IsHitTestVisible) can block the events?

I use GMap.NET.WindowsForms and GMap.NET.WindowsForms v.1.7.0.0.

Can someone help me please ?

Thank you.

JHN
